speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the debate on the report by Thijs Berman, on behalf of the Committee on Agriculture and Rural Development, on the proposal for a Council directive laying down minimum rules for the protection of chickens kept for meat production ( COM(2005)0221 – C6-0190/2005 – 2005/0099(CNS) ) ( A6-0017/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the debate on the report by Thijs Berman, on behalf of the Committee on Agriculture and Rural Development, on the proposal for a Council directive laying down minimum rules for the protection of chickens kept for meat production ( COM(2005)0221 – C6-0190/2005 – 2005/0099(CNS) ) ( A6-0017/2006 ).
agenda_item: Protection of chickens kept for meat production (debate)
